current.custom_text: Buy More, Save More - Up to 25% Off
current.custom_text_modal: LIMITED TIME ONLY. Receive 25% Off with any $150+ purchase, receive 20% off with any $100+ purchase or receive 15% off with any $75+ purchase. Discounts cannot be combined. Maximum one time use per order. Discount will automatically be applied at time of checkout. Promotional offer is not extended to resellers, wholesalers or diverters. Offer is limited to available inventory of qualifying item(s), while supplies last. No rain checks are available. Additional exclusions and restrictions may apply. Cannot be combined with any other promotional offer, discount or coupon, nor applied to previous purchases. McDavid reserves the right to modify or discontinue this offer at any time.Offer ends 09/02/25 11:59 PM PST.
current.custom_text2_modal: Discount will automatically apply at checkout. Promotional offer is not extended to resellers, wholesalers or diverters. Availability of qualifying item(s) may vary over the course of this promotion, accordingly, this offer is limited to available inventory of qualifying item(s), while supplies last. No rain checks are available. Additional exclusions and restrictions may apply. Cannot be combined with other promotional offers, discounts or coupons. Not applicable towards previous purchases. Shock Doctor reserves the right to modify or discontinue this offer at any time. Offer ends 12/23/24 11:59 PM PST.
current.custom_text3: 25% OFF MYOVOLT WRAPS - AUTOMATIC DISCOUNT AT CHECKOUT
current.custom_text3_modal: Discount will automatically apply at checkout. Promotional offer is not extended to resellers, wholesalers or diverters. Availability of qualifying item(s) may vary over the course of this promotion, accordingly, this offer is limited to available inventory of qualifying item(s), while supplies last. No rain checks are available. Additional exclusions and restrictions may apply. Cannot be combined with other promotional offers, discounts or coupons. Not applicable towards previous purchases. McDavid reserves the right to modify or discontinue this offer at any time. Offer ends 1/16/25 11:59 PM PST.
